article_summary:
And basically, call it the stupidity of the American voter, or whatever, but basically that was really, really critical for the thing to pass.
The bill was written in a tortured way to make sure CBO did not score the mandate as taxes.
@onceuponA I'm glad the Supreme Court didn't scoop Gruber on the mandate being a tax back in 2012.
To the meat of it, here's what Gruber said—and has subsequently apologized for—that has conservatives so riled up right now.
If [CBO] scored the mandate as taxes, the bill dies.
